options.description: set output channel layout (default "5.1")
options.name: chl_out

options.description: set input channel layout (default "stereo")
options.name: chl_in

options.description: set input level (from 0 to 10) (default 1)
options.name: level_in

options.description: set output level (from 0 to 10) (default 1)
options.name: level_out

options.description: output LFE (default true)
options.name: lfe

options.description: LFE low cut off (from 0 to 256) (default 128)
options.name: lfe_low

options.description: LFE high cut off (from 0 to 512) (default 256)
options.name: lfe_high

options.description: set LFE channel mode (from 0 to 1) (default add)
options.name: lfe_mode

options.description: set temporal smoothness strength (from 0 to 1) (default 0)
options.name: smooth

options.description: set soundfield transform angle (from 0 to 360) (default 90)
options.name: angle

options.description: set soundfield transform focus (from -1 to 1) (default 0)
options.name: focus

options.description: set front center channel input level (from 0 to 10) (default 1)
options.name: fc_in

options.description: set front center channel output level (from 0 to 10) (default 1)
options.name: fc_out

options.name: sl_out

options.name: lfe_in

options.description: set lfe channel output level (from 0 to 10) (default 1)
options.name: lfe_out

options.description: set all channel's x spread (from -1 to 15) (default -1)
options.name: allx

options.name: ally
